Params: {1: 'Chapter 2', 2: 'Bring Me A Dream', 3: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Atlas/CommonLogo/BgLogo1.png'}
{1: 'ThemeEnable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory26.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStorySandNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Forsaken', 3: "That's the main building of the Golden Vortex ahead of us, sir.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Can't believe there's something this creepy in this desert...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "If we guessed it right, the people we're looking for is inside there.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "We'll part ways here...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I'll head there by myself. You all stay here and stand guard.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Forsaken', 3: "Sir! Our report says that there are a large number of guards stationed there. We can't let you go alone!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "It's because they outnumber us that I'm not going to risk your lives.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Forsaken', 3: "You're our leader!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Forsaken', 3: "That's right, sir! Please, reconsider it...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "As you said, I'm your leader. I'm supposed to carry you if I have to.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'My objective is to save our people inside. Nothing else matters.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'You should show the same conviction and determination, and make sure that nothing goes wrong when we retreat.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "All electronic communication channels are disrupted in this region. I'll signal you with my flare gun once I figure out what's going on.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Remember my route in a minute.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Move immediately once you see my flare. Follow my path and strike the heart of the enemy!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Forsaken', 3: "...I knew you wouldn't act without a plan, sir!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Forsaken', 3: 'Sorry, sir! I misunderstood your intent...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'I told you before. No pandering on the battlefield.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Take this opportunity to prepare your rations, especially water!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "All those who're locked inside are the human members of the Forsaken. They're likely all dehydrated at this point.", 4: '1'}
